contact-elife.heading: Contact eLife
contact-elife.paragraph-1: You can use the "Check Status" link under Manuscript Tasks to find information about your article and how long different parts of the editorial and review process can take. If you have any further questions about submitting or submitted articles, please contact our editorial team. For queries regarding accepted articles, please contact our production team:
contact-elife.media-inquiries-paragraph: Media inquiries may be addressed to our communications team at:
